abstract: Rocket launched during firefight between Afghanistan military and Taliban insurgents strikes wedding party killing at least 26 and injuring others, as they were waiting for bride to arrive; Helmand Province incident concludes war's deadliest year, as officials report nearly 5,000 Afghan soldiers and police officers killed.
lead_paragraph: At least 26 people were killed late Wednesday when their wedding party was struck by a rocket in Helmand Province, the Afghan police said.
snippet: At least 26 people were killed late Wednesday when their wedding party was struck by a rocket in Helmand Province, the Afghan police said.

headline.main: Afghanistan: Many Are Killed When Rocket Hits Wedding Party
headline.print_headline: Afghanistan: Many Are Killed When Rocket Hits Wedding Party
